name: NCPC "MJOLNIR" Snapback
description:
The Norse gods were aware of their fate thanks to Odin's many sacrifices. 
It was fated that the world they ruled would crumble in flame, only to be reborn again, with some of the old gods remaining and some spirits new.  

Out of the void, the Nor Cal Pirate Crew has resurrected itself with a new beginning more universal and worldwide than ever before.

Be a part of this rebirth with the limited-edition snapback.  Embrace new beginnings and a thunderous return to glory with the Mjolnir snapback.

NCPC is not merely an acronym. It is a reckoning.
